title: EMA Trend with ADX Gate
purpose: Follow trend when EMA direction agrees and ADX confirms strength.
rationale: Use EMA for direction and gate trades with ADX>25 to reduce whipsaws.

reading_guide.signal_logic: close>ema20 AND adx>25 => bullish context (inverse for bearish)

beginner_summary: Trade with the EMA trend only when ADX shows a meaningful trend (e.g., >25).
assistant_hints: Use EMA for direction; require ADX>25 before entries.
Avoid counter-trend setups with low ADX.
